OpenText Official Distributor MENA | S2 Management Solutions

S2 Management is the official OpenText distributor in MENA region, providing Carbonite Availability, Carbonite Migrate, Cloud Backup, Email Archiving and Secure Cloud solutions for businesses in UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Oman, Bahrain, and Kuwait.

OpenText Solutions

Data Protection

  • Carbonite Availability: Real-time HA replication for any-to-any server protection with zero-downtime protection and automated failover
  • Carbonite Migrate: Live server migration with zero business interruption, supporting any-to-any migration and cloud migration

Secure Cloud

  • Cloud-to-Cloud Backup: Comprehensive backup for Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, Salesforce, Box, and Dropbox
  • Email Archiving & Continuity: Email protection, archiving, and business continuity with compliance features
  • Secure Cloud: Complete security suite including Endpoint Protection, EDR, MDR, Email Encryption, and Security Awareness Training

Contact S2 Management for OpenText solutions in the Middle East and North Africa region.
